sms.ClassEnum.description: The sms class of sms sending job

reference.CountryEnum.description: All country prices accessible from a reference

sms.TypeTemplateEnum.description: All existing types for a given template

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

referer.description: Specify if the sender is custom or not

sms.SmsSendingReport.description: A structure describing all information about quota informations

sms.PriorityEnum.description: The priority of an sms sending

callBack.description: URL called when state of a sent SMS changes

creditThresholdForAutomaticRecredit.description: Credit threshold after which an automatic recredit is launched

stopCallBack.description: URL called when a STOP is received after a receiver replied stop to a SMS

sms.AlertThreshold.description: A structure describing all information about alert threshold informations

sms.Incoming.description: Sms history of sms incoming received

sms.Response.description: A structure describing how to manage an sms Response

text.description: Automatic notification sent by text in case of customer reply.

cgiUrl.description: Default url callback used for a given response.

sms.Quota.description: A structure describing all information about quota informations

sms.HlrLookupNumber.description: Home Location Register informations. Give informations about a given cellular phone.

roaming.description: Is the MSISDN currently roaming outside its natinal network

ported.description: Has the MSISDN been ported from its original network

operatorCode.description: The {Mobile Country Code, Mobile Network Code} unique identifier

sms.TypeSenderEnum.description: All existing types for a given sender

sms.TemplateControl.description: Sms template for moderation (Needed to send in US country)

message.description: Message pattern to be moderated. Use "#VALUE#" format for dynamic text area.

restrictionCode.description: The type of routing restriction imposed by the operator

substitution.description: The substitution sender used to bypass operator filter

sms.Outgoing.description: Sms history of sms outgoing sent

tariffCode.description: Tariff code applied on the sms

sms.SupportEnum.description: The media support used to be contacted in case of alert

records.description: Number of receiver records in the document

sms.CountryEnum.description: All country suffixes accessible for sms services and "all" available

sms.Templates.description: A structure describing all information about templates informations

sms.RestrictionCodeEnum.description: Restriction type used by the operator to filter sms.

stopCallBack.description: URL called when a STOP is received after a receiver replied stop to a SMS

callBack.description: URL called when state of a sent SMS changes

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

sms.ReceiversAsynchronousCleanReport.description: A structure giving operation price and asynchronous task ID

sms.StatusSenderEnum.description: All existing status for a given referer

sms.PackOffer.description: A structure describing all information about an sms pack offer
